COMMON INTERCHANGE FORMATS
	Autodesk ( .fbx )						FBXImporter.h
	Collada ( .dae )						ColladaLoader.h
	Blender 3D ( .blend )					BlenderLoader.h
	3ds Max 3DS ( .3ds )					3DSLoader.h
	Wavefront Object ( .obj )				ObjFileImporter.h
	LightWave ( .lwo )						LWOLoader.h
	LightWave Scene ( .lws )				LWSLoader.h
	Modo ( .lxo )							LWOLoader.h
	DirectX X ( .x )						XFileImporter.h
	AC3D ( .ac, .ac3d )						ACLoader.h
	Milkshape 3D ( .ms3d )					MS3DLoader.h

GAME FILE FORMATS
	Doom 3 ( .md5* )						MD5Loader.h
	*Valve Model ( .smd,.vta )				SMDLoader.h
	*Open Game Engine Exchange ( .ogex )	OpenGEXImporter.h
	*Unreal ( .3d )							UnrealLoader.h

OTHER FILE FORMATS
	BlitzBasic 3D ( .b3d )
	Neutral File Format ( .nff )			NFFLoader.h
	Sense8 WorldToolKit ( .nff )			NFFLoader.h
	Object File Format ( .off )				OFFLoader.h
	Terragen Terrain ( .ter )				TerragenLoader.h

	Nevercenter Silo (.sib)					SIBImporter.h
